plot: After New York marketing executive Stephanie Burns loses her job, she packs up her two daughters and moves to Vermont to manage the dairy farm of Lucien LaFlamme, hoping to convert it into a tourist inn.
plot_en: After New York marketing executive Stephanie Burns loses her job, she packs up her two daughters and moves to Vermont to manage the dairy farm of Lucien LaFlamme, hoping to convert it into a tourist inn.
plot_es: After New York marketing executive Stephanie Burns loses her job, she packs up her two daughters and moves to Vermont to manage the dairy farm of Lucien LaFlamme, hoping to convert it into a tourist inn.
title: Windy Acres
